lead_paragraph: The Cowboys have done nothing to diminish their status as odds-on favorites to advance to the Super Bowl from the National Football Conference. But Dallas (2-0) still has not won a playoff game since 1996, in the dying days of a dynasty that Jeff Pearlman chronicled in a book that was released Tuesday.
